text: Anantara sayatana tadera ubhayake okhana theke padaskhalita karechila. Pare tara ye sukha-sbacchandye chila ta theke taderake bera kare dila ebam ami balalama, tomara neme ya'o. Tomara paraspara eke aparera sakra habe ebam tomaderake sekhane kichukala abasthana karate habe o labha sangraha karate habe.
